Workflow.Name: Deactivate children too old for the program
Workflow.Description: Cloud flow that will check every day the active children and deactivate the ones where the age is above the value of the "Maximum Child Age" environment variable.

LocalizedName.description: Deactivate children too old for the program

Description.description: Cloud flow that will check every day the active children and deactivate the ones where the age is above the value of the "Maximum Child Age" environment variable.
